4 crater lakes in India formed by meteorite impacts
Explained: ISI Bill 2025 and what it means for Kolkata’s control over its own institution
description: The draft Indian Statistical Institute Bill, 2025 proposes a major structural shift for ISI by replacing its society-based governance with a centrally defined statutory framework. For ISI Kolkata, this means a reorganisation of authority, decision-making and institutional hierarchy as the new Board of Governance becomes the primary decision-maker across academics, administration, finances and the future shape of ISI’s centres.

title: 'China running racket': EU attacks Beijing; rare earth curbs cause rift
description: The EU has strongly criticized China's control over rare earth exports, with a top official labeling Beijing's restrictions a "racket" that jeopardizes Europe's strategic autonomy.  The bloc is urged to accelerate efforts to reduce its dependence on Chinese critical minerals by diversifying supply chains and strengthening domestic capacity.

description: Karnataka Deputy CM DK Shivakumar described the CM change issue as a "secret deal" among a few party leaders, stating he wouldn't discuss it publicly to avoid embarrassing the organization. He emphasized the importance of party unity and conscience. Meanwhile, Congress President Mallikarjun Kharge also stressed that leadership changes are not for public discussion.

description: Egg freezing offers women extended reproductive choice, but it's not a guarantee of future pregnancy. Success hinges on age and the number of mature eggs retrieved, with younger women and those aiming for around fifteen eggs seeing better outcomes. Understanding the process's limitations and costs is crucial for informed decision-making.

description: A senior IAS officer in Madhya Pradesh faces backlash after a viral video showed him linking reservation continuation to inter-caste marriage. The All India Brahmin Society condemned the remarks as "indecent" and "casteist," demanding an FIR and disciplinary action. The officer later clarified his statement was taken out of context, expressing regret if sentiments were hurt.

description: A Karnataka homemaker has accused her husband of injecting her with mercury nine months prior to her death, leading to a slow decline in her health. title: Amazon's AI power play: Tech giant vetoes third-party tools; 'Kiro' takes centre stage
description: Amazon has directed its software engineers to cease using third-party AI coding tools like OpenAI's Codex and Anthropic's Claude Code, mandating exclusive use of its proprietary system, Kiro. This strategic move aims to bolster Amazon's competitive standing against rivals OpenAI and Google in the rapidly expanding AI code assistant market.

description: Madeline Mann, founder of Self Made Millennial, explains why the seemingly simple “Tell me about yourself” question often determines the course of an interview. description: Assam Chief Minister Himanta Biswa Sarma declared singer Zubeen Garg's death in Singapore a "plain and simple murder" in the state Assembly. He stated one person was responsible, with others aiding them. The opposition's adjournment motion to discuss the circumstances was admitted, with a Special Investigation Team and a judicial commission probing the incident.

title: Don’t look at top stocks to buy! Should you invest in stocks directly at all?
description: Direct stock investing demands significant time, temperament, and skill, often exceeding what most salaried individuals can commit. Full-time fund managers possess these advantages. For most, a diversified mutual fund portfolio offers a more realistic path to wealth creation, avoiding common investor pitfalls like panic selling and excessive trading. Direct stocks can be explored as a small, experimental allocation.

title: Is Erika Kirk pregnant? Megyn Kelly reacts to her prayer after Charlie’s death
description: Erika Kirk, widow of conservative activist Charlie Kirk, revealed her profound grief and hope during a talk with Megyn Kelly. She shared her prayer of being pregnant at the time of Charlie's tragic death, desiring a larger family. Erika also urged young women to prioritize starting families, emphasizing that careers can wait, but motherhood cannot be indefinitely postponed.

title: 3 night time drinks that can help reduce High Blood Pressure in the morning
description: The minerals, calcium, potassium and magnesium present in milk help blood vessels relax, while maintaining proper fluid equilibrium. The cardiovascular system experiences reduced pressure because of these effects, which also enhance artery flexibility

title: Gemini 3.0 launch: Salesforce CEO says won't use ChatGPT again; praises Google’s AI model
description: Salesforce CEO Marc Benioff declared he's switching from ChatGPT to Google's Gemini 3.0 after a two-hour trial, citing significant improvements in reasoning, speed, image, and video processing. This endorsement highlights the intense competition in the AI landscape, with even OpenAI's CEO acknowledging Google's advancements.
